name: queso
description: Pastel Theme is a soothing and refreshing light theme designed exclusively for Visual Studio Code. Immerse yourself in a gentle and harmonious coding environment with its carefully curated pastel color palette. Pastel Theme offers a perfect blend of tranquility and readability, creating a serene atmosphere that inspires productivity and focus. Let Pastel Theme bring a touch of elegance and calmness to your coding journey, making every line of code a joy to write.
